Diuine fancies digested into epigrammes, meditations, and observations / by Fra. Quarles. Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
[14], 206 p.
Printed by M.F. for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstans churchyard in Fleetstreet, London : 1633.
In verse. Signatures: [par.]⁴(-[par.]2) A-2C⁴ 2D³. Numbers 81-88 repeated and 89-96 deleted in the pagination. Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
